body.title: Technology Program Coordinator
body.description: Worked on the Technology team to create applications and maintain software to propel the missions of the EC. Utilized technological tools to streamline backend development and enable smooth and seamless user experiences.

body.title: Research and Software Development Intern
body.description: Learned to work with A-Frame, Unity 3D, and C# for VR/AR development. Developed evasive algorithms paired with the SHARKS (Secure, Heterogeneous, Autonomous, and Rotational Knowledge for Swarms) Protocol to defend a UAV swarm against adversarial UAVs. Simulated UAV swarms in VR and Unity 3D to gather data on the effectiveness of evasive maneuvers.

body.title: Chief Financial Officer
body.description: Managed and oversaw the agency’s revenue, project investments, and wages. Documented and handled invoices and expenses.

body.title: Marketing Staff Member
body.description: Worked on a marketing team for various clients looking to grow and expand their businesses. Designed videos, logos, and other adverts to promote branding of companies.

body.title: Mobile App Development Intern
body.description: Interned at a growing startup that plans on producing wireless earrings that play daily scheduled motivational sounds. Developed the app in Swift to manage the whisper (sound) library and the scheduling and playing of the whispers.

body.title: Private Online Tutor
body.description: Worked as a private tutor educating students in grades K-12 in various subjects including math, science, and physics.

body.title: Math Tutor
body.description: Taught kids about mathematical concepts and helped them sharpen their logical reasoning and computational skills.

body.title: Laboratory Intern
body.description: Worked at Georgetown University as an intern under the supervision of Dr. Niaz Sahibzada. Studied the function of GABAergic interneurons in the regulation of the brain-gut axis. Learned more about electrophysiology and neurobiology.

body.title: Bachelor of Science, Major in Computer Science, Minor in Finance
body.description:
Pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a Minor in Finance.
 Honors: Dean’s List (Spring 2020, Fall 2020, Spring 2021)
 Coursework: Linear Algebra, Data Structures, Discrete Structures, Algorithms, Software Development, Computer Organization, Principles of Programming Languages, Finite Automata, Intro to Machine Learning, Statistics, Principles of Accounting, Financial Management, Investments, Corporate Valuation and Credit Analysis, Advanced Investments, Derivatives and Risk Management.
 Activities and Societies: Intramural Basketball and Soccer, Association for Computing Machinery, Developer Student Club, Mason Investment Club, Finance Academy, Alpha Kappa Psi (Omega chapter) Fraternity, Sigma Phi Epsilon (Virginia Delta chapter) Fraternity

body.title: Advanced Studies Diploma
body.organization: Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology
body.description:
Coursework: AP Chemistry, AP Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Web App Development, AP Calculus BC, Multivariable Calculus, AP Spanish Language, Research Statistics 1, Physics, and DNA Science.
 Activities and Clubs: Bioengineering Projects for the Future, Innovations in Concepts of Engineering, Spanish Honor Society, Curricular Band, Varsity Football.
